text: [Ej kofiron] Ojo xaʙari [halokati] kasone, ki pes az sumo ʙudand, [monandi] qavmi Nuh va Od va Samud va [niz] onon, ki ʙa'd az eson ʙudand [va] cuz Alloh taolo kase az onon xaʙar nadorad, ʙa sumo narasidaast? Pajomʙaronason ʙo daloil [-u mu'cizot]-i ravsan ʙa sujason omadand, vale onon [ʙa nisonai muxolifat] dasthojasonro ʙar dahonhojason nihodand va [angust ʙa dandon gazidandu] guftand: «Mo on ciro, ki sumo ʙaroi [iʙloƣi] on firistoda sudaed, inkor mekunem va dar ʙorai on ci moro ʙa sujas mexoned, saxt dar tardidem»
